title: Cold Feet star John Thompson returns to filming
text:
Cold Feet resumed filming in Manchester on Wednesday and John Thompson was pictured filming alongside a mystery lady.

The actor, 50, who plays Pete Gifford, was seen collecting a wad of bank notes, but it's not clear why the exchange was taking place.

Later on, the pair were engaged in deep conversation as they headed out to grab two coffees to go.
